xylitol.mechanism: Potent insulin release → hypoglycemia; hepatotoxicity reported
xylitol.notes: Immediate veterinary attention; even small amounts can be fatal in small dogs

chocolate.notes: Severity depends on type (dark > milk) and weight

grapes_raisins.mechanism: Unknown toxin → acute kidney injury in susceptible dogs

onion_garlic_alliums.mechanism: Hemolytic anemia via oxidative damage to RBCs
onion_garlic_alliums.notes: Garlic more potent than onion; cumulative exposure matters

avocado.mechanism: Persin toxin: cardiac and respiratory failure in birds and some mammals
avocado.notes: High risk for birds and some small mammals

fireflies.mechanism: Lucibufagins → severe toxicity and death in insectivorous reptiles
